thread.title: Adele and Lionel Richie: Perfect mash-up of 'Hello'
thread.title_full: Adele and Lionel Richie: Perfect mash-up of 'Hello'

title: Adele and Lionel Richie: Perfect mash-up of 'Hello'
text:
Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
As the world swooned over Adele’s new single, “Hello,” Lionel Richie took it up a notch with a hilarious reference to his 1984 hit with the same title. 
A photo posted by lionelrichie (@lionelrichie) on Oct 24, 2015 at 8:53am PDT 
And now you may find yourself repeatedly watching the resulting mashup of the two artists’ music videos.
